content.critical_finding: Mail-01 was designed to support ONLY Gmail, not SendGrid. Discrepancy found between intention and implementation.

recent_commits: 481528a9: Complete transition from SendGrid to Gmail
d49c3718: Transition Mail-01 from SendGrid to Gmail

contradiction.actual: SendGrid was used initially, then transitioned to Gmail

content.conclusion: Project successfully transitioned to Gmail-only. SendGrid completely removed. Requirements met.
content.recommendation: No action needed. Gmail-only requirement fulfilled.
